thread.title: Nina Antkowiak
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Nina Antkowiak

author: Nina Antkowiak
title: Nina Antkowiak
text: David Roselli at the Macomb store was very helpful and knowledgeable about the products. Helped me find the right fit for what I was looking for. Love my new sofa and it was the inspiration for the design change in the the rest of my living room!
